wikipedia_page.main: Peter John Allan (6 June 1825 – 21 October 1848) was a Canadian poet.

response: * Peter John Allan (died 1848), Poetical Remains of Peter John Allan, Esq., Canadian poet published in London
* June 6 – Peter John Allan (died 1848), Canadian poet
He was member of the Anthropological Society of London. His younger brother was the poet Peter John Allan.
* (1853). "Biographical Notice of the Author," in The Poetical Remains of Peter John Allan. London: Smith, Elder & Co.
